about_the_game:
Warrior Armor Supporter Pack

  • Do your part! Unleash the aggressive style of the Warrior Bug in your next mission!

    The “Warrior Supporter Pack” includes:

    • Warrior Armor Helmet Visor

    • Warrior Armor Uniform

    • Warrior "Eat This!" Helmet Decal

    • Warrior themed Weapon Skin
detailed_description:
Warrior Armor Supporter Pack
